Improve this resume bullet:
""We are a local clothing brand based in Tahiti, drawing inspiration from our beautiful surroundings of endless summer and surf culture. Our brand ethos revolves around creating surfwear that seamlessly transitions into casual everyday wear, blending the laid-back vibe of island life with the stylish elements of American fashion.We are seeking a talented and experienced Graphic Designer to join our team and help bring our vision to life. The selected designer will be responsible for redesigning our logo and creating graphics for a range of apparel including hats, t-shirts, basketball shorts, boardshorts, and socks.Qualifications:* Experience with Apparel Design: We're looking for a designer with a proven track record in apparel design, including knowledge of garment construction, printing techniques, and an understanding of how designs translate onto fabric.* Proficiency in Design Software: The ideal candidate should be proficient in industry-standard design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or other relevant programs, enabling them to create high-quality designs and prepare files for printing or production.* Understanding of Branding: A strong understanding of branding principles is essential. The designer should be able to create designs that effectively communicate our brand's identity, values, and message to our target audience.* Portfolio: Please provide examples of previous work that demonstrate your skills and experience in apparel design. We're particularly interested in seeing a diverse portfolio showcasing versatility in design styles and types of projects.* Knowledge of Printing Techniques: Familiarity with various printing techniques such as screen printing, sublimation, or embroidery is advantageous. The designer should be able to design with these methods in mind to ensure optimal results.* Understanding of Trends: Keeping up with current design trends, especially in the fashion industry, is important to ensure that our designs remain relevant and appealing to our target audience.Additional Requirements:* Experience working with other clothing brands is highly preferred. Please provide references or examples of past collaborations.If you're passionate about surf culture, casual fashion, and bringing innovative designs to life, we'd love to hear from you. Join us in creating clothing that reflects the vibrant spirit of Tahiti and resonates with our global audience.Budget: $500Posted On: February 14, 2024 04:18 UTCCategory: Graphic DesignSkills:Clothing, T-Shirt Design, Fashion Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Print Design, Logo Design, Brand Identity & GuidelinesSkills: Clothing, T-Shirt Design, Fashion Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Print Design, Logo Design, Brand Identity & GuidelinesCountry: French Polynesia""

Improve this resume bullet:
""Dear potential collaborator,I am looking for an editor/second reader for a writing project that I am doing.The writing project is the following: it is a bundle of short stories and poetry throughout the life of a young woman. Each writing has a reaction to it from the young woman, explaining the context around the text. This reaction flows into a prompt for the reader to write with. The book is an interactive creative writing guide full of prompts, with the final goal to help people journal about life experiences through creative writing.The editor/second reader would need to:- Comment on the reactions- Comment on the overall structure- Help with technical improvements- Help with coming up with creative ideas for the setup- Help cater the book to the general public.In short, there are about 50 pages that I would need your review on. The writings themselves are set in stone: it's the reactions to them and the prompts that need an outside perspective.Send me a message with the reason why you would be interested in this project, what you have to add/offer to it, and any creative ideas you have relating to it. I'm looking for someone that is passionate about creative writing and self-development.Budget: $50Posted On: February 18, 2024 00:58 UTCCategory: Creative WritingSkills:Creative Writing, Proofreading, English, Content Writing, Commenting, Book WritingSkills: Creative Writing, Proofreading, English, Content Writing, Commenting, Book Writing""

Improve this resume bullet:
""We are in need of SEO services for our VA and Deck+Fundraising services. The effectiveness of your work will be measured by the quantity of Calendly appointments and the subsequent sales discussions they lead to. A detailed SEO strategy and an audit will be required every quarter.Additionally, the role may expand to include managing YouTube SEO and other areas, for which we will offer additional remuneration. This position is intended for a long-term partnership. Your task will include analyzing competitors such as Slide Bean, Magic VA, and Joorney, and coming up with 10 strategic approaches. For example, we're looking for articles like 'Get Uber Pitch Deck Template' to boost downloads and email subscriptions, and we need 10 more ideas like this.A thorough keyword research and competitive analysis are also part of the expectations. Our aim is to reach 4,000 website visits within the first 3 months, escalating to 16,000 in the following 3 months, with the progress being tracked through Calendly. You will be responsible for managing a website on either Wix or WordPress, including creating lead magnets, content, backlinks, and overall site supervision.To ensure we meet our targets, the bulk of the work, including page optimization and strategy implementation, is expected to be completed in the first 3 months. This initial phase is crucial for reaching our early sales target of 8. After achieving this, you will have an additional 3 months to work towards a sales target of 32, following which the next 6 months will be focused on cost recovery and less intensive work.We plan to engage you in extensive work on page strategies, backlinks, and both on-page and off-page SEO, requiring a commitment of at least 9 months to balance the costs. Terminating the contract within the first 3 months would be detrimental to your financial interests.Regarding website traffic and sales conversion: With 1,000 website visits and a projected 1% call rate, this would typically result in 10 calls. Assuming a 10% sales conversion rate for services priced between $2000-$4000 USD, this would likely yield 1 sale. To summarize, 1,000 visits at a 1% call rate gives 10 calls, and 10 calls with a 10% sales conversion rate equals 1 sale.Budget: $6,000Posted On: February 18, 2024 00:50 UTCCategory: SEOSkills:SEO Backlinking, Search Engine Optimization, SEO Keyword ResearchSkills: SEO Backlinking, Search Engine Optimization, SEO Keyword ResearchCountry: United States""

Improve this resume bullet:
""HeyOriginally we were on Wordpress we then migrated our site from to Shopify, now due to some emergency reasons, we have now migrated back to our WordPress site and decided to stay here once and for all, it has been a hectic few weeks.My website is: snusboys.co.ukWhat am I looking for?This website was just built and I am quite happy with the overall feel of this site. However, I know it was not built to the highest standard. It's messy from the back end and this is why we already have bugs such as issues with the search function and so on.What I need is a senior dev to come in and point out where my previous developer has lacked. And redevelop this to ensure that the site is robust, free of bugs and most importantly of high quality and built to last for years. Built well from the back and front end.In simple terms, please turn this website into something of high quality that will last me years to come in business, a website build that a professional dev would respect.Of course, I understand that to achieve this it may come with changes which I am open to. Creativity is welcomed.You will be in a group chat with me, my SEO guy and our developer.There will be great communication and you will never be left in the dark about anything. The purpose of this is so that everybody is on the same page and nobody will be able to do anything that harms each other's work. Don't worry they are both very friendly!Before you begin the re-development if you could give an audit or report highlighting some major errors and red flags you found in the build of the site explaining to me why they are problematic and the work you will be carrying out that would be great.Kind regards,TonyHourly Range: $20.00-$40.00Posted On: February 18, 2024 00:48 UTCCategory: Ecommerce Website DevelopmentSkills:WordPress, WooCommerce, Web Development, Web DesignSkills: WordPress, WooCommerce, Web Development, Web DesignCountry: United Kingdom""

However, we recognize the security risks associated with accessing customer ports directly. Hence, we are looking for a skilled engineer to devise a secure solution that eliminates the need for direct port access while ensuring seamless data transmission.Responsibilities:1. Security Assessment: Conduct a comprehensive security assessment of our current IoT-based cloud application architecture to identify potential vulnerabilities associated with port access.2. Solution Design: Develop innovative solutions to facilitate data transmission from customer premises to our servers without the need for direct port access. This could include implementing secure communication protocols, utilizing VPNs, or employing alternative methods that adhere to industry best practices.3. Implementation and Testing: Collaborate with the development team to implement and integrate the proposed solution into our existing infrastructure. Conduct thorough testing to ensure the solution is robust, reliable, and resistant to security threats.4. Documentation: Prepare detailed documentation outlining the design, implementation steps, and security considerations of the devised solution. This documentation will serve as a reference for internal teams and may be shared with customers as needed.5. Security Compliance: Ensure that the implemented solution complies with relevant security standards, regulations, and industry guidelines. Stay updated on emerging threats and security trends to proactively address any potential risks.6. ""Heya!I'm looking for a mangaka to draw a story which I've written.The title of this manga is going to be "Jinrui no Kokoro (The Heart of Humanity)".The general theme of the story is all about humaneness, constantly raising the question of "what constitutes humanity?", therefore I'm exploring ALL nuances of being a human within the story, also the ones that are generally being perceived as "taboos"! I want to show how it is really like to be human, containing all the beautiful things about being human, just as the dark and tragic ones. I'm being very explicit, not hiding any facets, thus I need a mangaka who is very resilient mentally!The story itself is going to be about a young man, who has essentially given up on his life already, standing on the verge of committing suicide, just to find out that he is the chosen one who is supposed to save humanity. On the journey to do so, he'll constantly be faced with how brutal reality is and what cruel things human beings are capable of, being forced into an internal struggle. He was not particularly fond of human beings at the start of his journey in the first place and throughout the story he'll be wondering more and more, if it's the right thing to save humanity or should he rather work along with those who're trying to eradicate it? Already shouldering this heavy burden, he falls in love with a young woman who accompanies him on his journey, who turns out to be an advanced AI robot, just as he starts to see an example in her for how pure human beings can be, further spilling oil into his ongoing questions about if it actually needs human beings. ""Dear Developer,We are looking to develop an Expert Advisor (EA) for both MetaTrader 4 (MT4) and MetaTrader 5 (MT5) platforms. The EA will execute trades based on spread between specified instruments profit/loss and after opening the trades, we need comprehensive trade control. EA will pick the price of given instruments from our given time and date and will assume trades are open from that time and date and will calculate the profit or loss of each instrument in USD ( Or Currency ) and will initiate the trades when spread between these different instrument, s equity will reach at specific level.Key Features:1. Spread Table Visualization: The EA will display a spread table on the chart, comprising 6 lines for different instruments or assets. Each line will consist of 10 boxes for essential details such as symbol, virtual lot size, direction, price, equity, and lot size for trade entry. Please refer to the attached sample picture for visualization.2. Trade Initiation Based on Spread: Trades will be automatically initiated when the spread between designated instruments reaches a specified value.EA will check The pair when spread will reach at our given level. EA will keep the maximum loss side pair direction in same as we set in the table while will change the direction of lower loss or profit side instrument for trade initiate. The EA will calculate and monitor spread differentials as per user-defined parameters.3. Equity-Based Trade Direction: Upon trade initiation, the EA will analyze the equity of involved instruments and determine the optimal trade direction. It will maintain the instrument with lower equity in the current direction and potentially reverse the direction of the other instrument for optimal risk management.4. Control Panel Features: The EA will include a comprehensive control panel with the following functionalities:• Display of starting date and time, with options for auto-update and with given distance.• Presentation of today's starting balance and equity.• Setting of equity and balance cutoff values for closing trades.• Configuration of email alerts for trade notifications.• Customizable trade headings for easy identification in email.• Trailing with 3 extra step. At first level, only jump to break even, Second jump to given profit target, from third trailing till exit with given distance.• Background settings for configuring spread parameters, trade initiation levels, and trade control options.5. Special Considerations and Requirements:• Ensure persistent settings across MT4/MT5 restarts, changes in date/time, timeframe, or instrument.• Address issues related to price freezing, requote, and excessive trading activity, with appropriate error handling mechanisms.• Configure email alerts to trigger only for executed trades, minimizing unnecessary notifications.• Implement safeguards against account closure due to hyperactivity, including the ability to deactivate the EA under certain conditions.• Ensure compliance with market trading hours and margin requirements, preventing trades during closed markets or insufficient margin situations.• Provide unique identification for trades initiated by the EA for precise management actions such as closure, reversal, or trailing.Next Steps: Please review the attached detailed proposal for a comprehensive understanding of the project requirements. We value your expertise and look forward to collaborating with you to bring this EA to life. If you have any questions or need further clarification on any aspect of the project, please don't hesitate to reach out.Posted On: February 18, 2024 11:13 UTCCategory: Desktop Software DevelopmentSkills:MetaTrader 4, MQL 5, MQL 4, Forex TradingSkills: MetaTrader 4, MQL 5, MQL 4, Forex TradingCountry: United States""
